profile.about:
Hello! I'm Leo Vincent, and I focus on utilizing code for creative solutions for unserved issues/needs.

As a full stack developer, I utilize Javascript, CSS, HTML, and React to develop apps that make others’ lives easier. My unique background as an audio/visual technician gives me the ability to learn quickly; and solve problems while under pressure. As someone who prefers to be multi-talented over hyper focused, I adapt quickly and easily to changes. This and my background gives me a perspective which allows me to see creative solutions that others might not.
profile.name: Leo Vincent

nodes.description: A tone guessing game where the user hears a note and has to pick between two options to say which note it was. The front end complexity is handled by React while the tones themselves are generated by Tone.js. Users can create an account to save their high score which is saved to a related model and stored using SQL.
nodes.name: Pitchy to Perfect

nodes.description: This app is a creative writing environment that uses JavaScript logic and DOM manipulation to give the user a focus timer and a place to write while a weather API gathers current weather data based on the user’s desired location, and updates the styling to match. Using a one to many relationship, users can save their writing to their profile where each piece can be viewed and deleted.
nodes.name: Write to Relax
